hadiths.text: Anas reported:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) would listen to the crying of a lad in the company of his mother, in prayer, and he would recite a short surah or a small surah

chapter.ara-name: باب أَمْرِ الأَئِمَّةِ بِتَخْفِيفِ الصَّلاَةِ فِي تَمَامٍ
chapter.eng-name: The Command To The Imam To Make The Prayer Brief But Complete
